content.text: Bitcoin (BTC) experienced a significant decline with a current price of $101,746, a 24-hour trading volume of $24,968,435,665, and a market cap of $2,016,865,086,833, closing down by $2,958.15.
Ethereum (ETH) is priced at $3,204.93, with a 24-hour trading volume of $15,811,054,087 and a market cap of $386,200,269,910, marking a decrease of $124.62.
Solana (SOL) has reached a value of $236.59, a 24-hour trading volume of $5,481,018,881, and a market cap of $115,121,580,274, down by $19.40.
The a16z token is priced at $0.7352, with a 24-hour trading volume of $15,674,509.31 and a market capitalization of $808,758,429, decreasing by 16.21%.
A new plugin-apro is introduced, offering actions like querying current coin prices, creating, and registering agents, and data verification.
Solana web3.js V2 and automated LPing on Orca have been updated, including a working demo setup and thorough testing.
Access Token Management has been added to the MultiversX Plugin, allowing token management limitation to specific users.
Season 2 of a notable project has begun, generating excitement in the community.
Aiccelerate Builders, the first incubator cohort, has seen over 100 applications, highlighting growing interest.
